author: Louise Boyle, Louise Boyle
title: Can testing the sewers sound the alarm ahead of a coronavirus outbreak?
description: A new study from the Netherlands detected traces of the virus at a sewage plant before cases were reported
content:
Before novel coronavirus cases were reported in the Dutch city of Amersfoort, an hour south of Amsterdam, scientists found traces of the virus in the sewage system.
The new study from the Netherlands signals the possibility that testing at wastewater facilit… [+7844 chars]
